commit message:
Exceptions everywhere!

Add verbose exceptions and handling, along with some basic messages
about each one.

Better error handling/reporting

Still needs to be hooked up with some intents to send an email,
and adding a dialog if the share intent was unavailable. Maybe
some font size tweaks in the dialog too

Error handling and dialog v2!

Added intents to send a bug report, information about root,
and other tweaks.
Add FAQ dialog, clean up about dialog
Add more information to bug reports

Don't allow behavior that will cause bad stuff to happen.

You must protect the user from the user!
